name: Kids Newsgirl Beanie - dark rose
description:
Slouchy, crocheted beanie with a long visor. Made with super soft, 100% cotton yarn. This hat is a perfect accessory to complete an outfit and makes a great prop for photos!

Please check my other listings for this hat in other sizes and colors. If you don't find exactly what you're looking for please let me know! I'd be happy to make a custom order for you!

*This hat is modeled in 2-4T size.*

Note: Colors may vary slightly from picture due to current yarn dye lots, computer monitor projections and photo lighting.

----------------------------------------------

Newsgirl Beanie Sizing Chart:
(measure the circumference of the head at the thickest part)

6-12 months 16"-18"
12-24 months 18"-19.5"
2T-4T 19.5"-20.5"
5T-preteen 20.5"-21.5"

----------------------------------------------

Care Instructions:

To keep you beanie looking its best, hand wash in cold water with mild soap and lay flat to dry.

----------------------------------------------

All designs and photos are copyrighted by Nili Barrett. Please do not copy or use without permission.

----------------------------------------------

name: Baby CandyStripe Flapper Beanie - celery, vanilla, rose pink, pastel pink
description:
Hand crocheted flapper beanie. This beanie features vibrantly colored "CandyStripes" and big crocheted flower on one side. Made with 100% cotton yarn.

Please check my other listings for this hat in other sizes and colors. If you don't find exactly what you're looking for please send me a convo. I'd be happy to make a custom order for you!

*This hat is pictured in newborn size.*

Note: Colors may vary slightly from picture due to current yarn dye lots, computer monitor projections and photo lighting.

----------------------------------------------

Baby Flapper Beanie Sizing Chart:
(measure the circumference of the head at the thickest part)

Newborn fits heads up to 14"
3-6 months 14"-16"

(Kids sizes also available in my shop)

----------------------------------------------

Care Instructions:

To keep you beanie looking its best, hand wash in cold water with mild soap and lay flat to dry.

----------------------------------------------

All designs and photos are copyrighted by Nili Barrett. Please do not copy or use without permission.

----------------------------------------------

Photography beautifully done by Jael Deyoung Photography: www.jaeldeyoungphotography.org

----------------------------------------------
